headline.main: STEUBEN GROUP ASKED TO COUNTER NYE TALK; Pecora Urges It to Allow an Answering Speech Tonight

lead_paragraph: Theodore Hoffman, president of the Steuben Society of America, was urged yesterday by Supreme Court Justice Ferdinand Pecora, national chairman of the Legion for American Unity, to invite a speaker to present an opposite viewpoint of that of Senator Gerald P. Nye, who is scheduled to address the annual Steuben Day dinner of the organization tonight at the Hotel Biltmore.
abstract: Nye to s at Steuben Soc annual dinner; counter-speaker offered by Legion for Amer Unity
